page.title: 11 TRANSPORT cont
page.content:
driver can be promoted,but it doesn't depend on how long he has worked,but how good he is. There are different fares 15,25,30,40+ 55.Though this depends on which zones you travel through.
OPINIONS OF LOCAL PEOPLE We interviewed a number of people about the bus service.Most people thought that it was very good indeed and that they could easily travel in any direction.Some complained of long waits for buses at certain times in the day.Some people said that they preferred to travel by underground railway as this was more reliable.
